Titles.eng: Fuse, Memoirs of the Hunter Girl
Titles.jpn: 伏 鉄砲娘の捕物帳

Summaries.eng: After the death of his grandfather, Hamaji, a hunter, leaves his house in the mountains. In the city, she hears rumors about creatures known as the "Fuse", which descended from humans and dogs devour human souls. While looking for hosting, she meets Shino, a young man with white hair and a mask puppy.
